channel.title: Noob - basis query over patch (Play - not write)
channel.description:
Hi,
I received my axoloti.
It works on my macbook pro, demo can be load in the CORE and i can play several patches.
The Patch DRUM 80808 doen't work. I tried to change the note but anyway.
what must i do ?
I tried to load patches from the community but i always have error message. Where must i put the .axp files ? why compilation doent work ?
Can you dirige me to a Drum patch with several sounds (synthesized). This patch have to be triggered by an external midi gear (so i have to strictly specify a midi channel because i have other gear). ?
Thanks !

item.title: Noob - basis query over patch (Play - not write)
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Arkodd:

internal axoloti keyboard

there is a control to adjust the midi channel in the keyboard window.
No need to load a sample for the 80808 patch.

Read full topic
item.source: Noob - basis query over patch (Play - not write)

item.title: Noob - basis query over patch (Play - not write)
item.dc:creator: @Arkodd Vincent
item.description:
@Arkodd wrote:

Thank you but i listen nothing, even in LIVE mode with the internal axoloti keyboard !

May i have to load sample ?

Read full topic
item.source: Noob - basis query over patch (Play - not write)

item.title: Noob - basis query over patch (Play - not write)
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Arkodd:

The Patch DRUM 80808 doen't work

It is set to listen to MIDI channel 10 ("standard" for drums), in view->settings.

Arkodd:

I tried to load patches from the community but i always have error message. Where must i put the .axp files ? why compilation doent work ?

Please be more specific: which error message? There is no need to put an .axp file in a special location, can be anywhere.

Read full topic
item.source: Noob - basis query over patch (Play - not write)
